subTitle: Ask us all your questions about our brand and our products, and get factual answers.

faqs.question: What kind of plastic recycling machines do you offer?
faqs.answer: Our range includes a variety of plastic recycling machines such as PET bottle recycling lines, PE/PP film recycling machines and plastic pelletizing machines. Each model is designed to meet different recycling needs, guaranteeing efficiency and reliability.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade my current recycling machine to a newer model?
faqs.answer: Yes, upgrades are possible and recommended to keep your operations modern and efficient. We provide upgrade kits and professional support to help you move from your current configuration to the latest technology available in our product range.

faqs.question: What are the advantages of buying recycling machines in bulk from your company?
faqs.answer: Bulk order customers benefit from substantial discounts, extended warranties and personalized after-sales services. Details vary according to order size and machine models, so please contact our sales team for a personalized proposal.

faqs.question: What kind of customer support do you provide for your recycling machines?
faqs.answer: All our customers benefit from comprehensive support, including installation advice, operational training and troubleshooting. Higher-level packages, such as our Premium support plan, offer 24/7 technical assistance and regular maintenance visits.

faqs.question: How often are your machine manuals and operating instructions updated?
faqs.answer: We regularly update our machine manuals and operating instructions to incorporate the latest safety precautions, technological improvements and troubleshooting tips. All updates are posted online and available free of charge to our existing customers.

faqs.question: Does your company provide turnkey solutions for industrial recycling projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, we specialize in providing complete turnkey solutions for industrial-scale recycling projects. This includes project assessment, system design, machine installation and operational training, tailored to your specific requirements.
